nodes.text: Wyle Artis was a male Sullustan amateur hunter who resided on the Tansarii Point Station during the Galactic Civil War. Around 1 ABY, he at some point during his stay met a spacer who he hired to go hunting for Flits and Scyks in the station's atrium. As a reward he presented the spacer with a hunting necklace plus a small amount of credits.

Wyle Artis was extremely enthusiastic about hunting but, at the time he met with the spacer, not particularly skilled at it. He was also very clumsy which is why he felt he couldn't take on the atrium's creatures himself and hired help.

Wyle Artis was an NPC in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. He was a non-hostile character found in the tutorial level of the game on Tansarii point station, which was added in the NGE update. He gives the player a single optional side-quest.
